nars.io

Interface Output

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JSONOutput, Memory, NAR, SentencePipe, TextOutput

    public interface Output
    Output Channel: Implements this and NAR.addOutput(..) to receive output signals on various channels

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Output.Channel 
      static interface  Output.ECHO
      explicitly repeated input (repetition of the content of input ECHO commands)
      static interface  Output.ERR
      warnings, errors & exceptions
      static interface  Output.EXE
      operation execution
      static interface  Output.IN
      implicitly repeated input (a repetition of all input)
      static interface  Output.OUT
      conversational (judgments, questions, etc...) output

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void output(java.lang.Class channel, java.lang.Object signal) 

    • Method Detail

      • output

        void output(java.lang.Class channel,
            java.lang.Object signal)
        Parameters:
        channel - classifies this output, specified as a Java class
        signal - the content of this output (any type)
